widely. Due to their interdependencies and similarities, there can be both synergies and conflicts for

significant operating challenges. These challenges are mainly associated with reduced synchronous
stem stability, and black start capability. Grid
forming converters will be a cornerstone
for the control of future electricity systems dominated by VRE generation. These converters will
